casebody.data:
No. 862,

Misc.

Chevallier v. Texas. William E. Gray for petitioner. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, George M. Cow-den, First Assistant Attorney General, R. L. Lattimore, Howard M. Fender and Gilbert J. Pena, Assistant Attorney! General, and A. J. Carubbi, Jr., for respondent.

Crim. Dist. Ct. No. 4, Harris County, Texas. Certiorari denied.

Mr. Justice Douglas is of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
